text.text_translated:
Are things getting worse every day? Is progress impossible? A writer named Steven Pinker says there is good news. He says we are making progress. We live longer, healthier, freer, and happier lives.

But Pinker says there is a big problem. He talks about the Enlightenment. The Enlightenment was an important time. In this time, people started to think about reason and science. Today, some leaders attack these ideas. They tell people to only care about their own group. They tell people not to believe in others.

Pinker says this is very dangerous. When leaders do this, they can hurt important things. They can hurt democracy. What is democracy? In a democracy, people choose their government. They can also stop countries from working together.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Are things getting worse every day? Is it impossible for things to get better? A writer named Steven Pinker says there is good news. He says we live longer lives now. We are also healthier, more free, and happier.

But Pinker says there is a big problem. The Enlightenment was a time in history. People started to think about reason and science. Today, some people attack these ideas. Some leaders tell people not to trust others. This is very dangerous. It can hurt important things, like democracy. And it can stop countries from working together.
